description: Retrieves a list that describes the permissions for shared AWS account IDs on a private image that you own.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the private image for which to describe permissions. The image must be one that you own.

parameters.name: SharedAwsAccountIds
parameters.description: The 12-digit identifier of one or more AWS accounts with which the image is shared. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the private image.

nested_items.name: SharedImagePermissionsList
nested_items.description: The permissions for a private image that you own.

nested_items.name: sharedAccountId
nested_items.description: The 12-digit identifier of the AWS account with which the image is shared.

nested_items.name: imagePermissions
nested_items.description: Describes the permissions for a shared image.

nested_items.name: allowFleet
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the image can be used for a fleet.

nested_items.name: allowImageBuilder
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the image can be used for an image builder.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to retrieve the next page of results for this operation. If there are no more pages, this value is null.
